note: I am an OTR truck driver, somewhat of a gamer, tech fan, proud husband to a beautiful wife and father to 2 fantastic kids. If you follow me expect a lot of posts about my travels, complaints about other drivers ( truck and car ) and just talk of the trucking industry as a whole.

Many interests, little time. Unschooling parent. Long-term interest in bicycles; built a bamboo diamond frame bike years ago, learning TIG welding now to mess around more again. I would like to talk with more thoughtful and empathetic people with whom I don't agree. Periodically I am very sad. Wrassle computers for money.

Half British, half Kuwaiti. Multiracial. Female. 34 years old. Married. Physician.

Love interactive 3D scientific visualizations & simulations, maps, exoplanets, & astronomy/astrophysics/planetarium software.

Tested the waters in 2016... returned in April 2022 with one or two other people. The avatar is an Earth Day photo from a few years ago on my campus. Header image is lifted from my Twitter cover photo.

I'm not as gone from Twitter as I'd like, not yet. And in spite of the Bluesky board's politics I'm active there too, @ harmonygritz.bsky.social. You'll find my longtime "rainbow" profile image there, for now.
